definition: to lift/to raise/to raise one's head/high/high spirits/soaring/expensive
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: I collaborated with Beyonce because I love her.
sentences.chinese: 我與碧昂絲合作，因爲我愛她。

sentences.english: Whether it's Shakira or Beyonce , I think it's OK.
sentences.chinese: 不管是夏奇拉或碧昂絲，我認爲這是確定。

sentences.english: Springsteen, Bono and Beyoncé performing at the Lincoln Memorial.
sentences.chinese: 斯普雷斯汀，博諾和碧昂絲在林肯紀念堂開唱。

sentences.english: I suspect that secretly, she looks like Beyonce.
sentences.chinese: 我私下裏揣測，她看起來像碧昂絲的。
